title: Help me! Need cash for catalytic converter... all HOF for sale
author: collectbaseball

posts.post_title: Help me! Need cash for catalytic converter... all HOF for sale
posts.post_content:
There's a good chance that my catalytic converter is gone and I'm going to have to replace it. Here are a few things for sale... all prices negotiable.

T201 Miller Huggins/Roger Bresnahan PSA 2 $30
T201 Sam Crawford/Ty Cobb SGC A $110
T205 Roger Bresnahan Mouth Closed SGC 20 $30

Mickey Mantle "My Favorite Summer" Signed Book (still sealed) $200
Ted Williams Signed Postcard (JSA) $80

Also taking offers on the whole lot.

[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/HugginsBresnahan.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/HugginsBresnahanReverse.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/CrawfordCobb.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/CrawfordCobbReverse.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/Bresnahan1-1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/MantleBook.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v402/collectbaseball/TedWilliamsPostcard.jpg[/IMG]

I will take the Huggins/Bresnahan t201.  Please email me with how you want payment.
Thanks
George Gogol

Email sent on the t201s and t205.

Danny
[url]Smithdfs@hotmail.com[/url]
Email sent on the Ty Cobb/Sam Crawford

Right now all cards are pending, autographs still available, though.


Thanks for the responses everyone,
Dan
